text: Perungavoor (), is a suburb located North of Chennai, a metropolitan city in Tamil Nadu, India. ==Location== Perungavoor is located in between Madhavaram, Red Hills, Minjur and Gnayiru in North of Chennai. The arterial road in Perungavoor is Madhavaram - Arumandai Road. ==References== ==External links== *CMDA Official Webpage Category:Neighbourhoods in Chennai
title: Perungavoor
